metadata.name: The Unmovable Mover
metadata.description:
"Immotus Motor Urbis Aeternae: Romae Renascentis Fundamentum"

The Unmovable Mover is a concept attributed to Aristotle. In it, he sees the explanation of the Cosmos. A principle so perfect that it moves while preserving its essence. It is and it is not. It moves while resting, and stays still because it iterates.

Dynamis / Potentia... In perpetual act and potency. 

Paradoxical in its existence.

My intention here was to provide a visually immersive experience of its fundamentals, even though this would be only an approximation.

Created using AI, Post-Edition, and SFX. It's my inaugural 1/1 from my The New School of Ath3ns collection.

A 4K resolution video can be provided to the collector if needed.
